about.title: О системе
about.description: Лексико-семантическая поисковая система Serelex возвращает на запросу список связанных по смыслу слов. Традиционная поисковая система по запросу возвращает список связанных по смыслу документов -- документов отвечающих на запрос. Таким образом, данная система позволяет искать слова связанные по смыслу с запросом. К примеру, по запросу 'fruit' возвращаются слова 'vegetable', 'mango', 'apple', '' и др. По запросу 'ununtu' система возвращает слова 'debian', 'mandriva', 'fedora', 'gentoo', 'opensuse'. Текущая версия основана на двух мерах семантической близости -- Serelex и PatternSim. Первая основана на определениях слов, вторая на лексико-синтаксических шаблонах и корпусе текстов. Данный проект находиться в стадии разработки. Мы ждем ваших замечаний и предложений по адресу  alexander.panchenko@uclouvain.be.
about.api_description: Вы можете использовать систему следующим образом без каких-либо ограничений: http://serelex.cental.be/find/norm60-corpus-all/ubuntu. Данный запрос должен возвратить множество слов семантически связанных со словом 'ubuntu' в формате JSON:

models.norm60-corpus-all: This semantic similarity measure relies on frequency of relation extraction with lexico-syntactic patterns (Efreq), number of relations between words (Rnum), frequency of the words in a corpus (Cfreq) and number of distinct patterns extracted a given relation (Pnum). For details please refer to the following paper: Panchenko A., Morozova O., Naets H. A Semantic Similarity Measure Based on Lexico-Syntactic Patterns. // In Proceedings of 11th Conference on Natural Language Processing (KONVENS 2012), — Vienna (Austria), pp.174--178, 2012.
models.pairs-all-raw-sort: This semantic similarity measure relies on frequency of relation extraction with lexico-syntactic patterns (Efreq) from WaCky and ukWaC corpora. For details please refer to the following paper: Panchenko A., Morozova O., Naets H. A Semantic Similarity Measure Based on Lexico-Syntactic Patterns. // In Proceedings of 11th Conference on Natural Language Processing (KONVENS 2012), — Vienna (Austria), pp.174--178, 2012.
models.norm31: This semantic similarity measure relies on frequency of relation extraction with lexico-syntactic patterns (Enum) and number of relations between words (Rfreq). For details please refer to the following paper: Panchenko A., Morozova O., Naets H. A Semantic Similarity Measure Based on Lexico-Syntactic Patterns. // In Proceedings of 11th Conference on Natural Language Processing (KONVENS 2012), — Vienna (Austria), pp.174--178, 2012.
models.norm51-corpus: This semantic similarity measure relies on frequency of relation extraction with lexico-syntactic patterns (Efreq), number of relations between words (Rnum) and frequency of the words in a corpus (Cfreq). For details please refer to the following paper: Panchenko A., Morozova O., Naets H. A Semantic Similarity Measure Based on Lexico-Syntactic Patterns. // In Proceedings of 11th Conference on Natural Language Processing (KONVENS 2012), — Vienna (Austria), pp.174--178, 2012.
models.norm42: This semantic similarity measure relies on frequency of relation extraction with lexico-syntactic patterns (Efreq) and frequency of the words in a corpus (Cfreq). For details please refer to the following paper: Panchenko A., Morozova O., Naets H. A Semantic Similarity Measure Based on Lexico-Syntactic Patterns. // In Proceedings of 11th Conference on Natural Language Processing (KONVENS 2012), — Vienna (Austria), pp.174--178, 2012.
models.raw-pukwac: This semantic similarity measure relies on frequency of relation extraction with lexico-syntactic patterns (Efreq) from ukWaC corpus. For details please refer to the following paper: Panchenko A., Morozova O., Naets H. A Semantic Similarity Measure Based on Lexico-Syntactic Patterns. // In Proceedings of 11th Conference on Natural Language Processing (KONVENS 2012), — Vienna (Austria), pp.174--178, 2012.
models.raw-wacky: This semantic similarity measure relies on frequency of relation extraction with lexico-syntactic patterns (Efreq) from WaCky corpus. For details please refer to the following paper: Panchenko A., Morozova O., Naets H. A Semantic Similarity Measure Based on Lexico-Syntactic Patterns. // In Proceedings of 11th Conference on Natural Language Processing (KONVENS 2012), — Vienna (Austria), pp.174--178, 2012.
models.cos-mknn-5-12130: This semantic similarity measure relies on definitions of Wiktionary and Wikipedia, cosine similarity function and MKNN algorithm. For details please refer to the following paper: Panchenko A., Adeykin S., Romanov A. and Romanov P. Extraction of Semantic Relations between Concepts with KNN Algorithms on Wikipedia. In.: Dmitry I. Ignatov, Sergei O. Kuznetsov, Jonas Poelmans (Eds.) Proceedings of 2nd International Workshop on Concept Discovery in Unstructured Data 2012. Published by KU-Leuven, ISBN 978-9-08-140991-9
models.cos-mknn-10-12130: This semantic similarity measure relies on definitions of Wiktionary and Wikipedia, cosine similarity function and MKNN algorithm. For details please refer to the following paper: Panchenko A., Adeykin S., Romanov A. and Romanov P. Extraction of Semantic Relations between Concepts with KNN Algorithms on Wikipedia. In.: Dmitry I. Ignatov, Sergei O. Kuznetsov, Jonas Poelmans (Eds.) Proceedings of 2nd International Workshop on Concept Discovery in Unstructured Data 2012. Published by KU-Leuven, ISBN 978-9-08-140991-9

For details please refer to the following paper: Panchenko A., Adeykin S., Romanov A. and Romanov P. Extraction of Semantic Relations between Concepts with KNN Algorithms on Wikipedia. In.: Dmitry I.
